subject_requirements.subject: English
subject_requirements.notes: Must be English I, II, III, and IV.

subject_requirements.subject: Math
subject_requirements.notes: Must include NC Math 1, NC Math 2, NC Math 3, and a 4th math course aligned with post-secondary plans.

subject_requirements.subject: Science
subject_requirements.notes: Must include Biology, Earth/Environmental Science, and a Physical Science (e.g., Physical Science, Chemistry, or Physics).

subject_requirements.subject: Social Studies
subject_requirements.notes: Must include World History, Civic Literacy, American History, and Economics & Personal Finance.

subject_requirements.subject: Electives
subject_requirements.notes: A 'concentration' of 2 elective credits in a single area (CTE, Arts, or World Language) is highly recommended.
